T02TD2298E:227b-1: sarba s'a ra sa mutstsha ya pra ka ra na /
T02TD2298E:227b-3: snying po kun las btus pa'i rab tu byed pa /
T02TD2298E:227b-4: bla ma dang sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2298E:227b-5: gang de dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD2298E:227b-6: snying la bde byed nyams myong ba //
T02TD2298E:227b-7: de yang kun du rtog pa tsam //
T02TD2298E:227b-8: 'dod chags bral ba'i dngos po gang //
T02TD2298E:227b-9: de ni gcig tu srid rgyu'i mchog / gang zhig yid kyis skyes pa yi //
T02TD2298E:227b-10: rnam par rtog pa gang dag kyang //
T02TD2298E:227b-11: de nyid rang bzhin yin phyir te //
T02TD2298E:227b-12: snang zhing rgyu ba 'di dag las //
T02TD2298E:227b-13: mya ngan 'das pa gzhan du ni //
T02TD2298E:227b-14: yod min yul ni tsal yang //
T02TD2298E:227b-15: rnam par mi rtog bdag nyid sems //
T02TD2298E:227b-16: rnam rtog spangs pa de bzhin te //
T02TD2298E:227b-17: mya ngan 'das pa zhes brtag go //
T02TD2298E:227b-18: gnyis med mya ngan 'das pa min //
T02TD2298E:228a-1: ba'ang ma yin pa kho na //
T02TD2298E:228a-2: so sor 'gegs cho ga gang yin dang //
T02TD2298E:228a-4: gsum gyi dngos po'ang med pas na //
T02TD2298E:228a-5: gang gis gang zhig ji ltar 'grub //
T02TD2298E:228a-6: yul ni dngos med gnyis yin no //
T02TD2298E:228a-7: so sor 'gegs pa'i bye brag ci //
T02TD2298E:228a-8: nam mkha'i me tog la sogs pas //
T02TD2298E:228a-9: cir yang mthong zhing rgyas pa bzhin //
T02TD2298E:228a-10: skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD2298E:228a-11: bden pa'i dngos po sbyin snang ba //
T02TD2298E:228a-12: rnam rtog stobs las bsal ba la //
T02TD2298E:228a-13: bus pa'i 'bras bu ngo mtshar che //
T02TD2298E:228a-14: ji ltar bus pa bkres pa dag / sor mo rang gi khar bcug nas //
T02TD2298E:228a-15: nu zho 'bab pa lta bu ni //
T02TD2298E:228a-16: mchil ma 'thungs pas du ba med //
T02TD2298E:228a-17: de lta bas na 'bras rmongs pas //
T02TD2298E:228a-18: mya ngan 'das la sogs par byed //
T02TD2298E:228a-19: bde ba thob par 'dod pa yi //
T02TD2298E:228a-20: so so'i skye bo de nyid dman //
T02TD2298E:228a-21: 'gro rnams de ltar sdug bsngal bas //
T02TD2298E:228a-22: thob par gyur pa mi mnyam ste //
T02TD2298E:228a-23: drud pa las byung me yis ni //
T02TD2298E:228a-24: 'od ma tshig gyur ji bzhin no //
T02TD2298E:228a-25: chags dang chags bral zhes bya ba //
T02TD2298E:228a-26: rnam par spangs nas mnyam gzhag na //
T02TD2298E:228a-27: sdug bsngal med cing bde ba med //
T02TD2298E:228a-28: de nyid mthong bar som nyi med //
T02TD2298E:228a-29: snying po kun las btus pa'i rab tu byed pa /
T02TD2298E:228a-30: slob dpon chen po shr'i a'a nanda badzra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2298E:228a-32: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra p'a ni dang /
T02TD2298E:228a-33: bod kyi lo ts'a ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o//
